de.a46.memory
Interface MGUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainPanel
public interface MGUI

Interface MGUI has to be implemented by the gui-layer. All methods, that are called by a Game are collected here.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke

Method Summary
 boolean hasEqualImages()
          checks, if there are two same images open.
 void incrementTrialsCounter()
          increments the trialscounter by one.
 void removeCard(int cardID)
          removes a card from the field.

          sets the bigImage at a specified bigImagePanel.
 void setBigimageHint(boolean b)
          shows or hides the bigImage hint, where to click the cards back to the field.

          sets the status of the specified card.
 void setFieldEnabled(boolean status)
          sets the enabled status of the card field
 

Method Detail

setBigImage

public void setBigImage(int locationID,
                        int imageID)
sets the bigImage at a specified bigImagePanel.
Parameters:
locationID - an int as defined by LeftPanel.UPPER / LeftPanel.LOWER,
imageID - an int as the image's ID in the currentCardImages array

removeCard

public void removeCard(int cardID)
removes a card from the field.
Parameters:
cardID - an int (0..35) to identify the card.

setCardEnabled

public void setCardEnabled(int cardID,
                           boolean status)
sets the status of the specified card.
Parameters:
cardID - an int (0..35) to identify the card,
status - a boolean. true = enabled, false = disabled.

hasEqualImages

public boolean hasEqualImages()
checks, if there are two same images open.
Returns:
true if a pair is found, false otherwise.

incrementTrialsCounter

public void incrementTrialsCounter()
increments the trialscounter by one.

setFieldEnabled

public void setFieldEnabled(boolean status)
sets the enabled status of the card field
Parameters:
status - a boolean. true = enabled, false = disabled.

setBigimageHint

public void setBigimageHint(boolean b)
shows or hides the bigImage hint, where to click the cards back to the field.
Parameters:
b - a boolean. true = show, false = hide.
